commands.description: Write zeros to the disk with `shred`.
commands.command: shred --force --verbose --iterations=1 /dev/sda

commands.description: Read data from sector 0 to validate if have been changed.
commands.command: dd if=/dev/sda bs=512 count=1 skip=0 | xxd -ps
commands.stderr:
1+0 records in
1+0 records out
512 bytes copied, 0.0205159 s, 25.0 kB/s

method.name: Basic Erasure
method.description: A single-pass overwrite of the entire drive with zeros. This method is relatively fast and simple, but it may not be completely effective in destroying all traces of the original data.
